description: This file declares the DobbyInterface class which provides an interface for container management operations such as start, stop, pause, resume, and retrieve container info. It also handles events related to container lifecycle. The class interfaces with external proxy components and includes methods for mounting, unmounting, annotating containers, and executing commands.

classes.name: DobbyInterface
classes.description: A class providing a comprehensive interface for managing container lifecycles and configurations via Dobby proxies and IPC mechanisms, including event handling.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the DobbyInterface with an event handler.

methods.name: terminate
methods.description: Cleans up resources before shutting down the interface.

methods.name: listContainers
methods.description: Retrieves a list of all containers.

methods.name: getContainerInfo
methods.description: Fetches detailed information about a specific container.

methods.name: getContainerState
methods.description: Gets the current state of a specific container.

methods.name: startContainer
methods.description: Starts a container with specified parameters.

methods.name: startContainerFromDobbySpec
methods.description: Starts a container using a Dobby specification.

methods.name: stopContainer
methods.description: Stops a running container.

methods.name: pauseContainer
methods.description: Pauses a running container.

methods.name: resumeContainer
methods.description: Resumes a paused container.

methods.name: hibernateContainer
methods.description: Hibernates a container with specified options.

methods.name: wakeupContainer
methods.description: Wakes up a hibernated container.

methods.name: executeCommand
methods.description: Executes a command inside a container.

methods.name: annotate
methods.description: Adds an annotation to a container.

methods.name: removeAnnotation
methods.description: Removes an annotation from a container.

methods.name: mount
methods.description: Mounts a filesystem source into the container.

methods.name: unmount
methods.description: Unmounts a mounted filesystem from the container.

methods.name: onContainerStarted
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container starts.

methods.name: onContainerStopped
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container stops.

methods.name: onContainerStateChanged
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container’s state changes.

methods.name: onVerityFailed
methods.description: Callback for verification failures.

ctags.name: mEventListenerId
ctags.pattern: /^            int mEventListenerId; \/\/ Dobby event listener ID$/
